data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadDistributionPolicy
data.value: select top(1) DIST_PLCY_ID, EFFECTIVE_DT, DISCONTINUE_DT, MAX_PRCD_DT, CLT_IDENTIFIER from CKT_DIST_PLCY where (@cltIdentifier = CLT_IDENTIFIER) and (EFFECTIVE_DT <= @effectiveDt) and (DISCONTINUE_DT > @effectiveDt)

data.name: ReadDistributionPolicyRule
data.value: select DBP_GENERATED_ID, DIST_PLCY_RL_ID, FIRST_LAST_IND, DEBT_FUNC_TYP, DEBT_STATE, APPLY_TO, DPR_NEXT_ID, DIST_TO_ORD_TYP_CD from CKT_DIST_PLCY_RL where @dbpGeneratedId = DBP_GENERATED_ID order by DIST_PLCY_RL_ID

data.name: ReadLegalAction
data.value: select top(1) LEGAL_ACTION_ID, STANDARD_NO from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION where LEGAL_ACTION_ID = @legalActionId

data.name: ReadObligation
data.value: select top(1) T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.OB_ID, T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID from CKT_OBLIGATION T1 join CKT_OBG_RLN T3 on (T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID = @dtyGeneratedId) and (T1.OB_ID = @obId) and (T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID = T3.OTY_FIRST_ID) and (T1.OB_ID = T3.OBG_F_GENERATED_ID) and (T1.CSP_NUMBER = T3.CSP_F_NUMBER) and (T1.CPA_TYPE = T3.CPA_F_TYPE) and (@otySecondId = T3.OTY_SECOND_ID) and (@obgGeneratedId = T3.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspNumber = T3.CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = T3.CPA_TYPE)

data.name: ReadObligationType
data.value: select T1.DEBT_TYP_ID, T1.DEBT_TYP_CD, T1.DEBT_TYP_CLASS, T1.SUP_PRSN_REQ_IND from CKT_OB_TYPE T1 join CKT_DPR_OBLIG_TYPE T2 on (T1.DEBT_TYP_ID = T2.OTY_GENERATED_ID) and (@dprGeneratedId = T2.DPR_GENERATED_ID) and (@dbpGeneratedId = T2.DBP_GENERATED_ID)

data.name: ReadObligationTypeObligationDebtDebtDetail
data.value: select T1.DEBT_TYP_ID, T1.DEBT_TYP_CD, T1.DEBT_TYP_CLASS, T1.SUP_PRSN_REQ_IND, T2.CPA_TYPE, T2.CSP_NUMBER, T2.OB_ID, T2.LGA_ID, T2.PRIM_SEC_CD, T2.ORD_TYP_CD, T3.OB_TRN_ID, T3.OB_TRN_TYP, T3.CSP_SUP_NUMBER, T3.CPA_SUP_TYPE, T4.DUE_DT, T4.BAL_DUE_AMT, T4.INT_BAL_DUE_AMT, T4.RETIRED_DT, T4.CVRD_PRD_START_DT, T4.CVD_PRD_END_DT, T4.PRECNVRSN_PGM_CD from CKT_OB_TYPE T1 join CKT_OBLIGATION T2 join CKT_OB_TRN T3 join CKT_DEBT_DTL T4 on (T3.OTY_TYPE = T4.OTY_TYPE) and (T3.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T4.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (T3.OB_TRN_TYP = T4.OTR_TYPE) and (T3.OB_TRN_ID = T4.OTR_GENERATED_ID) and (T3.CPA_TYPE = T4.CPA_TYPE) and (T3.CSP_NUMBER = T4.CSP_NUMBER) and (T4.RETIRED_DT = @retiredDt) and (T4.DUE_DT between cast(@date1 as date) and cast(@date2 as date)) on (T2.DTY_GENERATED_ID = T3.OTY_TYPE) and (T2.OB_ID = T3.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.CSP_NUMBER = T3.CSP_NUMBER) and (T2.CPA_TYPE = T3.CPA_TYPE) and (T2.CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) on T1.DEBT_TYP_ID = T2.DTY_GENERATED_ID order by T4.DUE_DT, T4.BAL_DUE_AMT, T4.INT_BAL_DUE_AMT, T3.OB_TRN_ID

data.name: ReadProgramDprProgram
data.value: select T1.PROGRAM_ID, T1.CODE, T1.INTERSTATE_IND, T1.DISTRBTN_PRGM_TYPE, T2.DBP_GENERATED_ID, T2.DPR_GENERATED_ID, T2.PROGRAM_STATE, T2.ASSISTANCE_IND from CKT_PROGRAM T1 join CKT_DPR_PROGRAM T2 on (T1.PROGRAM_ID = T2.PRG_GENERATED_ID) and (@dprGeneratedId = T2.DPR_GENERATED_ID) and (@dbpGeneratedId = T2.DBP_GENERATED_ID)

data.name: UpdateDistributionPolicy
data.value: update CKT_DIST_PLCY set MAX_PRCD_DT = @maxPrcdDt where DIST_PLCY_ID = @distPlcyId
